title: Stuck Between Two Women That I Love
itunes:title: Stuck Between Two Women That I Love
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been married to my lovely wife for 8 years and we have three children. My wife is great and we have a normal marriage and enjoy each spending time with each other. When my wife and I started dating, my siblings loved her, but my mom tolerated her. When we decided to get married, my wife told me that she could tell my mom was not happy about it. I blew it off and thought everything would be fine. Well, it’s not fine and I feel bad for my wife.................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
